TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ParameterizedThreadStart extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ParameterizedThreadStart(obj As Object)
type ParameterizedThreadStart = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: obj
param.span: 包含线程过程的数据的对象。

span.span: An object that contains data for the thread procedure.

summary.span: 表示在 上执行的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that executes on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建托管线程时，将通过以下方式表示在线程上执行的方法：When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by: - 传递到 构造函数的 委托。A delegate that is passed to the constructor. 任何没有参数并且在或中C#返回 `void` 的方法都是 Visual Basic 可以表示委托的 `Sub` 过程。Any method that has no parameters and that returns `void` in C# or is a `Sub` procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate. - 传递到 构造函数的 委托。A delegate that is passed to the constructor. 任何具有 类型的参数且在或中C#返回 void 的方法都是 Visual Basic 可以表示该委托的子过程。Any method that has a single parameter of type and that returns void in C# or is a Sub procedure in Visual Basic can represent the delegate. 直到调用 方法，线程才会开始执行。The thread does not begin executing until the method is called. 在线程上调用 或 委托，并在委托表示的方法的第一行开始执行。The or delegate is invoked on the thread, and execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the delegate. 对于 委托，传递到 方法的对象将传递到委托。In the case of the delegate, the object that is passed to the method is passed to the delegate. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和C#用户在创建线程时可以省略 或 委托构造函数。Visual Basic and C# users can omit the or delegate constructor when creating a thread. 在 Visual Basic 中，将方法传递到 构造函数时使用 `AddressOf` 运算符;例如，`Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`。In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`. 在C#中，只需指定线程过程的名称。In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure. 编译器选择正确的委托构造函数。The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor. > [!NOTE] > 为中C++的实例方法创建 委托时，构造函数的第一个参数是实例变量。When you create a delegate for an instance method in C++, the first parameter of the constructor is the instance variable. 对于静态方法，该构造函数的第一个参数为零。For a static method, the first parameter of the constructor is zero. 对于静态方法，委托构造函数只需要一个参数：由类名限定的回调方法的地址。For a static method, the delegate constructor requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name. 委托和 方法重载使您可以轻松地将数据传递给线程过程，但此方法不是类型安全的，因为任何对象都可以传递到 中。The delegate and the method overload make it easy to pass data to a thread procedure, but this technique is not type safe because any object can be passed to . 将数据传递给线程过程的一种更可靠的方法是将线程过程和数据字段放入辅助角色对象。A more robust way to pass data to a thread procedure is to put both the thread procedure and the data fields into a worker object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在启动时创建线程和传递数据](/dotnet/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time)。For more information, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](/dotnet/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time). 委托仅支持一个参数。The delegate supports only a single parameter. 可以通过将多个数据项传递到 ，方法是使用以下参数之一：You can pass multiple data items to the by making that parameter one of the following: - 一个 数组。An array. - 集合类型，如果所有数据项的类型相同，则为。A collection type, if all of the data items are of the same type. - 元组类型，如 或 。A tuple type, such as or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 委托来执行静态方法和实例方法。The following code example uses a delegate to execute a static method and an instance method. 第一个 委托由静态 `DoWork` 方法表示，第二个委托由实例 `DoMoreWork` 方法表示。The first delegate is represented by the static `DoWork` method and the second is represented by the instance `DoMoreWork` method. 这两个方法都匹配 委托签名;也就是说，它们具有一个类型 的参数，不会返回值。Both methods match the delegate signature; that is, they have a single parameter of type and don't return a value. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和C#编译器从 `DoWork` 和 `DoMoreWork` 方法的签名推断 委托，并调用正确的构造函数。The Visual Basic and C# compilers infer the delegate from the signatures of the `DoWork` and `DoMoreWork` methods, and call the correct constructor. 因此，在代码中没有显式构造函数调用。Thus, there is no explicit constructor call in the code. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ParameterizedThreadStart/VB/source.vb#1)]
